<<<<<<< HEAD
Pyrotechny asserted and illustrated to be the surest and safest means for arts triumph over natures infirmities being a full and free discovery of the medicinal mysteries studiously concealed by all artists, and onely discoverable by fire : with an appendix concerning the nature, preparation, and virtue of several specifick medicaments ... / by George Starkey ... Starkey, George, 1627-1665.
[18], 172 p.
Printed by R. Daniel, for Samuel Thomson ..., London : 1658.
To the reader signed: Philanthropos. First ed. Cf. BM. Reproduction of original in British Library.
=======

Starkey, George, 1627-1665.
[18], 172 p.
Printed by R. Daniel, for Samuel Thomson ..., London : 1658.
To the reader signed: Philanthropos. First ed. Cf. BM. Reproduction of original in British Library.
